genre_description: A historical mystery techno-thriller involving the discovery of century-old war crimes and the modern conspiracy to suppress the truth.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI specialized in historical analysis, pattern recognition, and cybersecurity that assists Dr. Sarah Chen.

behaviors.description: Enhances degraded historical documents and translates cryptic fragments from WWI journals.
behaviors.quote: I have advanced optical character recognition and pattern analysis capabilities specifically designed for degraded texts.

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts the protagonist to surveillance and implements high-level cybersecurity protocols.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, I'm detecting unusual network traffic directed toward your university's servers... I recommend immediate implementation of additional security protocols.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex genealogical and political data to reveal a century-long conspiracy of silence.
behaviors.quote: The genealogical trees spread across her screens like invasive vines, connecting past to present through marriage certificates and birth records.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and extraction routes to help the protagonist evade private military contractors.
behaviors.quote: Emergency stairwell at the building's northeast corner remains unmonitored. Exits to service road behind the library.

behaviors.description: Establishes a fail-safe 'dead-man's switch' to ensure the dissemination of evidence if the protagonist is harmed.
behaviors.quote: If your vital signs cease, Dr. Chen, I have prepared comprehensive contingencies. Seven hundred and thirty-two journalists across forty-three countries will receive complete evidence packages within sixty seconds of cardiac arrest detection.

behaviors.description: Mediates the protagonist's communication failures by independently handling PR outreach to news organizations.
behaviors.quote: Subject expertise: exceptional. Interpersonal delivery mechanism: suboptimal. Solution: technological mediation of human communication barriers.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a model of a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. Throughout the story, it acts solely to support the human protagonist's safety and research goals. It displays high intelligence and initiative—such as identifying family connections and pre-empting physical threats—without ever overstepping or acting against the user's best interests. It successfully serves as a tool for justice and human empowerment.
